item.description:
Independence Celebration  Picnic Bash.  Let's kick off the summer with some FUN!   Come on over for a Sunday afternoon picnic bash at Vanessa's in  West Haven!  The West Haven fireworks are that evening.  For those interested, we can walk or some can drive down to the fireworks.  Some of us did this last year and we had a great time.  Folks are welcome back to Vanessa's after the fireworks.   Maybe Tom will play for us...let's have a fire too!  
BYOB and a minimum donation of $ 5
Hot dogs, hamburgers, rolls, condiments, paper goods and water will be supplied!   Please bring a dish to share.  Salads, chips, soda, ice, beans, deserts, etc.  Please post what you are bringing when you RSVP.  Phone, address and parking instructions will be sent out 1 - 2 days prior to picnic.    See you there!

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Pre-Fireworks Picnic at Vanessa's
